TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ExpressionVisitor extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示表达式树的访问者或重写者。

span.span: Represents a visitor or rewriter for expression trees.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类旨在以创建其功能需要遍历、 检查或复制的表达式树的专用化程度的类被继承。This class is designed to be inherited to create more specialized classes whose functionality requires traversing, examining or copying an expression tree.

MemberSignature.Value: protected ExpressionVisitor ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: ExpressionVisitor();

summary.span: 将表达式或者表达式列表调度到此类中更专用的访问方法之一。

span.span: Dispatches the expression or the list of expressions to one of the more specialized visit methods in this class.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Linq.Expressions.Expression> Visit (System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Linq.Expressions.Expression> nodes);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression> Visit(class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression> nodes) cil managed

public: System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::Linq::Expressions::Expression ^> ^ Visit(System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::Linq::Expressions::Expression ^> ^ nodes);

summary.span: 将表达式列表调度到此类中更专用的访问方法之一。

span.span: Dispatches the list of expressions to one of the more specialized visit methods in this class.

returns.span: 如果修改了任何一个元素，则为修改后的表达式列表；否则返回原始的表达式列表。

span.span: The modified expression list, if any one of the elements were modified; otherwise, returns the original expression list.

summary.span: 将表达式调度到此类中更专用的访问方法之一。

span.span: Dispatches the expression to one of the more specialized visit methods in this class.

returns.span: 如果修改了该表达式或任何子表达式，则为修改后的表达式；否则返回原始表达式。

span.span: The modified expression, if it or any subexpression was modified; otherwise, returns the original expression.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<T> Visit<T> (System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<T> nodes, Func<T,T> elementVisitor);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<!!T> Visit<T>(class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<!!T> nodes, class System.Func`2<!!T, !!T> elementVisitor) cil managed
Public Shared Function Visit(Of T) (nodes As ReadOnlyCollection(Of T), elementVisitor As Func(Of T, T)) As ReadOnlyCollection(Of T)
static member Visit : System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<'T> * Func<'T, 'T> -> System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<'T>

param.name: elementVisitor
param.span: 一个委托，访问单个元素，还可以将它替换为新元素。

span.span: A delegate that visits a single element, optionally replacing it with a new element.

summary.span: 使用指定的元素访问者访问集合中的所有节点。

span.span: Visits all nodes in the collection using a specified element visitor.

returns.span: 如果修改了任何元素，则为修改后的节点列表；否则返回原始的节点列表。

span.span: The modified node list, if any of the elements were modified; otherwise, returns the original node list.

summary.span: 访问表达式，将结果强制转换回原始的表达式类型。

span.span: Visits an expression, casting the result back to the original expression type.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<T> VisitAndConvert<T> (System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<T> nodes, string callerName) where T : System.Linq.Expressions.Expression;

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<!!T> VisitAndConvert<(class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression) T>(class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<!!T> nodes, string callerName) cil managed
Public Function VisitAndConvert(Of T As Expression) (nodes As ReadOnlyCollection(Of T), callerName As String) As ReadOnlyCollection(Of T)

member this.VisitAndConvert : System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<'T (requires 'T :> System.Linq.Expressions.Expression)> * string -> System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<'T (requires 'T :> System.Linq.Expressions.Expression)> (requires 'T :> System.Linq.Expressions.Expression)

param.name: callerName
param.span: 调用方法的名称，用于报告更好的错误消息。

span.span: The name of the calling method; used to report to report a better error message.

summary.span: 访问集合中的所有表达式，将结果转换回原始表达式类型。

span.span: Visits all expressions in the collection, casting the results back to the original expression type.

returns.span: 如果修改了任何表达式，则返回修改后的表达式集合；否则返回原始表达式集合。

span.span: The modified expression collection, if any expression was modified; otherwise, returns the original expression collection.

exception.span: 其中一个表达式的访问方法返回不同的类型。

span.span: The visit method for one of the expressions returned a different type.

summary.span: 访问表达式，将结果强制转换回原始的表达式类型。

summary.span: 访问扩展表达式的子级。

span.span: Visits the children of the extension expression.

returns.span: 如果修改了该表达式或任何子表达式，则为修改后的表达式；否则返回原始表达式。

span.span: The modified expression, if it or any subexpression was modified; otherwise, returns the original expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这可以重写以访问或重写特定扩展节点。This can be overridden to visit or rewrite specific extension nodes. 如果未重写，则此方法将调用，这将使该节点有机会其子级。If it is not overridden, this method will call , which gives the node a chance to walk its children. 默认情况下，将尝试减少节点。By default, will try to reduce the node.
